scripts.endurance:qa: $(npm bin)/artillery run -e qa endurance-tests.yml -o endurance-tests.json ; $(npm bin)/artillery report endurance-tests.json
scripts.endurance:dev: $(npm bin)/artillery run -e dev endurance-tests.yml -o endurance-tests.json ; $(npm bin)/artillery report endurance-tests.json
scripts.load:qa: $(npm bin)/artillery run -e qa load-tests.yml -o load-tests.json ; $(npm bin)/artillery report load-tests.json
scripts.load:dev: $(npm bin)/artillery run -e dev load-tests.yml -o load-tests.json ; $(npm bin)/artillery report load-tests.json
